creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: framed collage with worn and torn pieces of linoleum in brown and red shades and layered over each other; mounted on black paper with black pigment; piece of linoleum is folded over, revealing white flaking surface in ULQ; printed linoleum logo on back of piece in center and in LLQ; blonde ponytail of hair, bound with black tape in top center; scattered yellowed blobs of wax throughout; yellow streaks of pigment on black backing paper in upper right edge; burgundy dripping liquid elements in upper right edge and in top center
image_copyright: © Harmony Hammond %2F Licensed by VAGA at Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C NY
inscription: ULC on pack in black ink: \"UNTITLED (FORM OF DESIRE)\" | MUST BE KEPT UPRIGHT OR | FLAT ON BACK | NO TIPPING
title: Untitled (Form of Desire)
